moa.gui

Class PreviewPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • moa.gui.PreviewPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ResultPreviewListener

    public class PreviewPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ResultPreviewListener
    This panel displays the running task preview text and buttons.
    Version:
    $Revision: 7 $
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • latestPreviewChanged

        public void latestPreviewChanged()
        Description copied from interface: ResultPreviewListener
        This method is used to receive a signal from TaskMonitor that the lastest preview has changed. This method is implemented in PreviewPanel to change the results that are shown in its panel.
        Specified by:
        latestPreviewChanged in interface ResultPreviewListener
